description_html: Belmont is an inviting lounge collection that thrives in dynamic environments. This collection features mobile options for a variety of shapes allowing endless configurations to fit any need. A wide selection of occasional tables will help complete and elevate your space. Belmont is engaging and modular, featuring a combination of shapes available in both ottoman style lounge and occasional tables that provide users with the ability to create their own configuration. Belmont's shared tables are designed to encourage collaboration while creating an open and inviting environment. Belmont's lightweight seating features mobile options allowing it to be easily moved and rotated giving the user the ability to modify the space to their needs. Upgrade to a durable, high-gloss dry erase surface to release the full potential of collaboration.
